boardgame.name: The Edge: Dawnfall
boardgame.description: The Edge: Dawnfall is a dynamic, miniature and card battle game with elements of territory control (gathering crystals) as well as campaign play. Each player controls unique units with special abilities that can be enchanted with special spell or progress cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players win the game in solo or co-op mode by completing plot conditions of the scenario, or in the competitive skirmish mode by gaining advantage of 7 Victory Points. The game is set in the original post-apocalyptic universe of The Edge and features 6 factions with very different backstories, game styles and aesthetics._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: The Edge: Dawnfall – Father of the Sun

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Warchest pledge full.

Complete War Chest Box. Kickstarter Pledge with all stretch goals in english language. I opened the box due to announced shipping problems in the last Kickstarter Update. I checked all parts and everything is fine! I already own the game! Shipping Germany: 7€ Shipping Europe: 20€ Includes: - All 6 factions (78 models!) - Darkness expansion - Bell Crow expansion - Abyssal Empress expansion

This is for one Warchest (includes all six factions) and the Darkness stretch goals, which includes the Bell Crow and Abyssal Empress (both the Bell Crow and Abyssal Empress are inside the Darkness box). The Darkness box_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s plastic wrap was removed so that I could insert the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Campaign Secret Envelope_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; that was included in my shipment that is meant to be opened after completing the three campaigns. The Darkness box has an empty slot in its plastic tray that is normally occupied by the Prime Shadow, but the Prime Shadow was an add-on, not a stretch goal, so it is not included. No add-ons are included. They are in hand and ready to ship.

Dawnfall Warchest KS with all stretch goals totally unboxed Shipping not included (most probably additionally 20.30 €). The game can be sent to destinations in Europe. preferred payment method is bank transfer.
Kickstarter Warchest edition For shipping costs; please send me a message first.

Complete War Chest Kickstarter Pledge with all stretch goals. + Siege Storm Base Game + Etherfields Card Pack + Campaign Secret Envelope Everything new and still in shrink. Includes: - All 6 factions (78 models!) - 420 illustrated action cards + 42 squad cards - Game components (4 banner models, 6 custom dice, 8 darkness terrain models, 40 crystal tokens, wooden tokens, 2 cardboard boards 56x84cm each, 36 terrain tiles) - Story elements (scenario book, 6 maps, 6 sets of stickers) - Darkness expansion (13 models, 47 cards, campaign book and tokens) - Bell Crow expansion [Kickstarter Exclusive] (5 models and 17 cards) - Abyssal Empress expansion (1 model and 10 cards) Available add-ons: Cardboard Bosses and Terrain Expansion with Artbook, Storybook and Comicbook (+€79) - 6x cardboard standees - 30 AI cards - 12 additional scenarios - 8x cardboard portal - 8x cardboard tokens - 12x cardboard objectives - 12x terrain cards - 8 additional scenarios Shipping with PostNL: Belgium: €6,50 Luxembourg, The Netherlands: €10,50 France, England, Germany: €15,50 Spain, Italy: €18,50 Sweden: €21,50 USA: €58,30 Shipping with BPost: Belgium: €6,00 The Netherlands, Luxembourg, Germany, France, England: €16,40 Rest of European Union: €49,20 Rest of Europe and USA: €65,60 Rest of World: €131,20 Shipping with DPD: Belgium: €6,00 Germany, Luxembourg, The Netherlands: €10,00 Denmark, Estonia, France, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Austria, Poland: €23,00 Bulgaria, Finland, Greece, Croatia, Portugal, Romania, Spain: €30
This is not for the core game. This is what you get for this listing, includes shipping to any USA address. • Full terrain bundle • Father of the Sun • All Bosses bundle [ImageID=4259512]
New in shrink. Full Warchest pledge with darkness expansion and all kickstarter extras. Will accept bank transfer or cash (pickup) as well.

Add-on for The Edge Dawnfall Cardboard Bosses and Terrain Expansion with Artbook, Storybook and Comicbook Contains: - 6x cardboard standees - 30 AI cards - 12 additional scenarios - 8x cardboard portal - 8x cardboard tokens - 12x cardboard objectives - 12x terrain cards - 8 additional scenarios Shipping with PostNL: Belgium: €5,90 Luxembourg, The Netherlands: €8,50 France, England, Germany: €13,50 Spain, Italy: €16,50 Sweden: €19,50 USA: €32,50 Shipping with BPost: Belgium: €6,00 The Netherlands, Luxembourg, Germany, France, England: €16,40 Rest of European Union: €32,80 Rest of Europe and USA: €32,80 Rest of World: €65,60 Shipping with DPD: Belgium: €6,00 Germany, Luxembourg, The Netherlands: €10,00 Denmark, Estonia, France, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Austria, Poland, Slovakia, Slovenia, Czech Republic, UK, Sweden: €23,00 Bulgaria, Finland, Greece, Croatia, Portugal, Romania, Spain: €30

Hot off the press and ready to be played. One complete in the shrinkwrap game with the Darkness add-on is up for grabs. The game weighs about 10 kgs full of beautiful minis. Only selling cause I accidently got 2 sets. Buyer pays shipping.

Complete War Chest Kickstarter Pledge with all stretch goals. (This is not the Big Box Pledge, so it does not include the bonus Comic Book, Art Book, And Story Book+) + Siege Storm Base Game + Etherfields Card Pack + Campaign Secret Envelope http://awakenrealms.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/4_Warchest-INSIDE-23.jpg Includes: - All 6 factions (78 models!) - 420 illustrated action cards + 42 squad cards - Game components (4 banner models, 6 custom dice, 8 darkness terrain models, 40 crystal tokens, wooden tokens, 2 cardboard boards 56x84cm each, 36 terrain tiles) - Story elements (scenario book, 6 maps, 6 sets of stickers) - Darkness expansion (13 models, 47 cards, campaign book and tokens) - Bell Crow expansion [Kickstarter Exclusive] (5 models and 17 cards) - Abyssal Empress expansion (1 model and 10 cards)
Faceless vs. Reborn with Demon extra faction and KS extras (Darkness). Punched. Played once. $20 shipping

IN HAND Kickstarter The Edge: Dawnfall Conflict Box: Rha-Zack vs. Dvergar Includes 3rd Faction: Faceless Faction Including ALL Stretch Goals _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Kickstarter Exclusives: Darkness Faction Bell Crow Expansion Abyssal Empress Expansion Elite Squads for all included factions This game is NOT planned to go into retail. See images for everything included. Excludes any additional Kickstarter purchasable add-on_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s. If you have any questions please feel free to ask. I am offering multiple shipping options. Pick which you prefer! Contents: Rha-Zack vs. Dvergar factions from conflict box (26 models) Faceless faction (13 models) 210 illustrated action cards and 21 squad cards Other game components (2 Banners, 2 custom dice, 20 crystal tokens, 4 darkness terrain models, 18 terrain tiles, Cardboard Board 56x84cm, game wooden tokens, Scenario book, 4 maps and 4 sets of stickers) Additional Kickstarter Stretch Goals free with the order: Darkness expansion (13 models, 47 cards, campaign book and tokens) Bell Crow expansion [Kickstarter Exclusive] (5 models and 17 cards) Abyssal Empress expansion (1 model and 10 cards) Elite Squads for each faction (9 models with cards)

Warchest Pledge Shrink removed, but contents are unpunched/unplayed. Comes in 2 boxes - main warchest box with 6 factions and a separate box for the stretch goals (Darkness and others) Does not include the promos for Etherfields (deck of playing cards) and Siege Storm. If those are important to you, let me know. Including (copied from the pledge confirmation I received): - All 6 factions (78 models!) - 420 ilustrated action cards + 42 squad cards - Game components (4 banners, 6 custom dice, 8 darkness terrain models, 40 crystal tokens, wooden tokens, 2 cadrboard boards 56x84cm each, 36 terrain tiles) - Story elements (scenario book, 6 maps, 6 sets of stickers) Additional Kickstarter Stretch Goals free with the order: Darkness expansion (13 modles, 47 cards, campaign book and tokens) Bell Crow expansion [Kickstarter Exclusive] (5 models and 17 cards) Abyssal Empress expansion (1 model and 10 cards) Graphic showing contents: http://awakenrealms.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/4_Warchest-INSIDE-23.jpg

This is the war chest. Great Condition, played only a few times for review. No mini_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s broken, which can happen even with new versions. Mostly sleeved, used high quality FFG sleeves. Will include several packs to continue with sleeving. Removed awful box inserts, and will bag each faction and pack well. Comes with the Darkness Expansion, Solo Campaign, and 3 competitive campaigns. Sticker Sheets still bound and untouched.

I will forward this onto the buyer when it arrives (free UK postage). Price does not include shipping and fees. Worldwide shipping available, please get in touch for a quote!
